item.title: Nasdaq Revamps Listing Rules for Small IPOs, Chinese Firms
item.description: Nasdaq Inc. is revamping rules that companies pursuing small initial public offerings must follow to list and continue to be traded on its exchanges, the latest effort to protect investors from wild s
